Summary: 2 Red Lights circling droping and disappering....came together and shined bright white lights then parted very fast
divs: sighting detailsi was getting ready for work, then relaxed on my bed. i then heard thunder verry loud thunder constant thunder. i ran outside in my front yard and looked beyond the trees in front of me and saw 2 red very fast blinking lights flying side by side upwards and were dancing together....i panic and ran into the house and grabbed my fiance and roomate and they also saw the red lights zoom here and there then they disappered. my roomate went inside the house and my fiance and i stayed outside. looking.. a few seconds later 2 huge bright white lights zoomed in on us.. i took off running in the house and left my fiance outside (what a man) the bright light faded 1 after the other and parted back to where they were flying with each other....todays date is 9\18\07... i gurentee they will come back tonight...i will try get any footage i can. please get ahold of me...thank you
